item.title: Learning to Love Vim
item.description: Introduction When I first learned about Vim I wasn’t very enthusiastic about it, I wasn’t very open minded and didn’t want to use it because I didn’t know how to use it. However, things have changed, and I’m now using vim as my primary editor! I used to use Text Wrangler (back when I used a MacBook), then switched over to Visual Studio Code when I switched over to using Linux, I eventually settled on using Sublime Text, and still do use it for larger projects.
